Data.Title: Numbers 10 - 19
Data.Description:
To form any number from 10 to 19. Place 10 and Number. 
11: 十一 = 10:十 じゅう (Juu) 1:一　いち (Ichi) 
15: 十五 = 10:十 じゅう (Juu) 5:五　ご(Go)　
19: 十五 = 10:十 じゅう (Juu) 9:九　きゅう(Kyuu)

Data.Title: Numbers 20 - 99
Data.Description:
To form any number from 20 to 99. Number + 10 + Number. 
20: ニ十 =  2:ニ　に (Ni)  +  10:十　じゅう (Juu)   
63: 六十三 =  6:六　ろく (Roku)  +  10:十　じゅう (Juu) + 3:三 さｎ (San) 
98: 九十八 =  9:九　きゅう (Kyuu)  +  10:十　じゅう (Juu) + 8:八 はち (Hachi)

Data.Title: Numbers 100 - 900
Data.Description:
Number 100 = 百 (ひゅく - Hyaku). 
 To form any number from 100 to 900. We put the number in front of 百 = Number + 百. 
- 100: 百 (ひゅく - Hyaku)
- 200: ニ百 (に　ひゅく - Ni Hyaku)
- 300: 三百 (さん　ひゅく - San Byaku, This case is an exception)
 - 600: 六百 (ろく　ひゅく - Roppyaku, This case is an exception)
 - 800: 八百 (はち　ひゅく - happiyaku, This case is an exception)

Data.Title: Numbers 1000 - 9000
Data.Description:
Number 1000 = 千 (せん - Sen). 
 To form any number from 1000 to 9000. We put the number in front of 千 = Number + 千.
- 1000: 千 (せん - Sen)
- 3000: 三千 (さん　せん - San Zen, Exception)
- 4000: 四千 (よん　ひゅく - Yon Sen)
- 6000: 六千 (ろく　ひゅく - Roku Sen)
- 8000: 八千 (はち　ひゅく - Hassen, This is an exceiption)

Data.Title: Number 10000
Data.Description:
Number 10000 = 万（まん - Man).
 To form numbers from 10000 the rule is the same, the number goes in front of 万 = Number + 万.
- 10000: 一万  (いち　まん - Ichiman)

Data.Title: Rule to form numbers
Data.Description:
The rule to form any number is split that whole number:
- 11 (10 + 1) = 十一
 (じゅう いち - Jū Ichi)

- 21 (2 + 10 + 1) = ニ十一 
 (に　じゅう いち - Ni Jū Ichi)
- 121 (100 + 2 + 10 + 1) = 百ニ十一 (ひゅく　に　じゅう いち -　Hyaku Ni Jū Ichi)
- 321 (3 + 100 + 2 + 10 + 1) = 三百ニ十一 (さん　ひゅく　に　じゅう いち -　San byaku Ni Jū Ichi)
- 1321 (1000 + 3 + 100 + 2 + 10 + 1) = 千三百ニ十一 (せん　さん　ひゅく　に　じゅう いち -　Sen San byaku Ni Jū Ichi)
- 4321 (4 + 1000 + 3 + 100 + 2 + 10 + 1) = 四千三百ニ十一 (よん　せん　さん　ひゅく　に　じゅう いち -　Yon Sen San byaku Ni Jū Ichi)
